website_summaries.verdict: A well-made elliptical machine that has many user-friendly features in a design that won't take up a lot of space.
pros: Offers a comfortable workout that puts zero impact on joints
Compact design is easy to store
Has a 5-inch screen that allows you to access trainers while you exercise
cons: Heavier than expected, but this isn't a major concern considering all it has to offer

customer_reviews.title: iFit is Bloatware
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so frustrated activating a product. It was simple to complete assembly of the elliptical but then you have to go through a whole rigmarole to create multiple account with NordicTrack and iFit. I spent over an hour on the phone listening to advertisements on hold from the phone numbers included to finally get my machine activated. Hold your Bluetooth button for 30 seconds to skip the hassle. I will not buy another product that incorporated iFit. The website and service department seem focused on selling more products/memberships rather than helping.
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: Silence was short lived..
customer_reviews.text: Started clicking after every rotation; I barely have 10 hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: Fess

customer_reviews.title: Equipment is great, but the customer service is horrible
customer_reviews.text: After setting up the elyptical, we were instructed to go online to 'activate' the performance screen. To get activation procedure, you had to subscribe to Ifit, a personal performance register. (you can cancel at any time according to the site) $15.99 a month. OK. I don't need this. Now it's time to cancel. Nowhere on the 2 sites is the cancellation button. After 3 weeks and 6 emails and waiting for hours on 3 phone calls, I am still waiting for just a useful REPLY from Nordic Track. SCAM.
customer_reviews.author: even more fun

customer_reviews.title: Not great service, probably ought to invest a little more than this to get quality.
customer_reviews.text: Took several weeks to receive it. They rescheduled 3 times only to find out the machine had been sitting in Waco the entire time. We have it now, and the resistance seems like it's always turned up. I run half marathons, cycle, and lift regularly, so an elliptical isn't usually this hard, and I haven't even dated to raise the resistance. Update: You're also required to sign up for this iFit membership. (Which we didn't want) After I cancelled it, they continued to charge me saying that it hadn't been cancelled.. You'll be much happier of you avoid NordicTrak altogether!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lund

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The unit is not very sturdy nor stable. The price seemed good for the unit being a NordicTrack but does not have the material quality that you would expect from a NordicTrack product. The stride is not smooth. I would strongly advise you do a lot of research and if possible try this unit out before you commit to purchasing. I am very disappointed and am out a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Boo!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery won’t bring 2 ft past front door and assembly won’t move it. So if I want to work out in the foyer, I’m all set!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C Steen

customer_reviews.title: iFit
customer_reviews.text: It's ridiculous the machine is locked until you activate a iFit account. I don't want or need this feature. I just want to use the machine. This should be optional to add. I get that you can cancel, but a person should not be forced into that requirement.
customer_reviews.author: RAD

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for real exercise
customer_reviews.text: This is okay if you do not want to use it all the time. After about the first year it will start to squeak and that is when you should call in the warranty because it is the start of the machine breaking down and parts cracking! This is the 2nd Nordictrack we have purchased that had part crack within 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: It does not work, arrives locked and wants you to subscribe for a couple 100$ subscription. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Wobbles like crazy, and requires you to pay for iFit monthly
customer_reviews.text: This this wobbled badly, even after tightening it in every place it could be tightened. Additionally, it *requires* you to have an iFit membership, which is $15 a month. I returned the treadmill after 1.5 weeks, and am now having to fight them to refund the iFit charge. Horrible experience. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: John Wells

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd nordic track elliptical in 23 years. Well designed but quality control problems. Arrived quickly but now have to wait 7-10 days for replacement control panel because of incorrect wiring. Spending my quarantine just looking at it and not able to use it ! What a disappointment..
customer_reviews.author: michael c holesek

customer_reviews.title: Works great, except pulse meter.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works for exactly what I need it for. The pulse counter only works every once in a while which is why I have this 4 stars rather than 5.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Extra charges
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that for to be able to use it I have to get a monthly plan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great choice, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great choice, sturdy, has many features that make it fun. Super easy to set up, you do need 2 people because it's a little heavy, specially when taking out of the box. 30 to 40 min to get it up n running
customer_reviews.author: elena padilla

customer_reviews.title: The SE7i is perfect. It is comprable to the gym elliptical machines.
customer_reviews.text: I paid to have the SE7i assembled. It took one hour and $100.00. A younger person would have no problem with the instalation.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry mott

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid piece
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid piece, With the elliptical and diet, I'm down 10 lbs this past week. The machine is rather large, definitely takes 2 people to move, is not a spacesaver as the name designates. No clear instruction as to how I can pair it with iFit, but overall, very satisfied with the machine. DO NOT, DO NOT I say... pay someone to install it for you. We got it up and running within 10 minutes out of the box. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kaydahzinne

customer_reviews.title: It works great and the it was easy to schedule assembly as ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great and the it was easy to schedule assembly as well. Deloar from Signs Connect was professional and fast at assembling the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing equipment!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, arrived on schedule, EASY ASSEMBLY, Heavy duty, great builtin workouts! The 2 men who delivered it were AMAZING!! Great experience all around!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this product at all. I've had it for a little over a month. It makes an annoying noise when I'm running and its so unstable it feels like its going to break. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The total workout
customer_reviews.text: I like how you can change it up everyday- resistance, elevation, Speakers, and IPad holder. Obviously the thing you don’t like is how it kicks your A— but what results
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lohafer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great ,very well made and packed well for shipping, easy to put together you do not need to pay for to have it put together,once I had it out of the box 10 mins and up a going. Can not find any faults with it at this time after one week of using . Good purchase very happy
customer_reviews.author: Slhw

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this elliptical forever. The only thing I did not like is it being locked and the screen telling you to go to ifit.com and put in the code which does not work. It was very confusing. All you have to do is hold the Bluetooth button until the code comes up and then enter that in. The smoothness and overall machine makes a great workout. The cooling fan is a plus. This machine can do everything the video states and more.
customer_reviews.author: Nikkia

customer_reviews.title: Their products are awful - and their service is worse..
customer_reviews.text: Do your self a favor - STAY AWAY FROM NORDICTRACK. Their products are awful - and their service is worse...there are a ton of better options out there....
customer_reviews.author: Amir NC

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: Do not under any circumstance buy a product from Nordictrack. They now require that you install an app to your phone AND give it access to all of your files, photos, and contacts before you cant turn on your Elliptical, treadmill, and other products. Get equipment from a different company! You have been warned!
customer_reviews.author: S. Olson

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a Nordic Track in October of 2016, ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Nordic Track in October of 2016, the Monitor gave false heart rate reading in May 2017 and after multiple emails the company has not honored its warranty. I wouldn't buy from Nordic track again.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Lauzon
